text: Pilosocereus aureispinus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are dry savanna and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Pilosocereus aureispinus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Pilosocereus aureispinus
